title: The historie of the reigne of King Henry the Seuenth VVritten by the Right Hon: Francis Lo: Virulam, Viscount S. Alban. Whereunto is now added a very vsefull and necessary table.
author: Bacon, Francis, 1561-1626.
publisher: Printed by I. H[aviland] and R. Y[oung] and are to be sold by Philemon Stephens and Christopher Meredith, at the signe of the Golden Lyon in Pauls-Church-yard,
notes: A reissue, with cancel title page, of the 1628 edition.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
